patterns: Where is IIT Jammu Located?
responses: The Indian Institute of Technology Jammu is located on the north side of Jammu city. The campus is situated on lush green land of Jagti village en-route to Katra via NH-44.

patterns: How to reach IIT Jammu?
responses:
You can reach IIT Jammu by air, rail or road. 

By Air: IIT Jammu is around 17 km away from Jammu Airport. From Jammu Airport, plenty of auto rickshaws and prepaid taxis are available to reach the IIT Jammu Jagti campus.

By Train: Jammu is a railway hub connected to many cities through trains. IIT Jammu is around 13 km away from Jammu Railway Station. From Jammu Railway Station, you can take a bus going to Katra which will drop you in front of the IIT Jammu Jagti Campus or you can take a prepaid taxi or auto rickshaw to reach the campus.

By Bus: IIT Jammu is around 12 km away from Jammu Bus stand. From the Bus Stand, you can take a bus going to Katra which will drop you in front of the IIT Jammu Jagti Campus. Alternatively, you can take a matador, three-wheeler, or taxi to reach IIT Jammu Jagti Campus.

patterns: How is the climatic condition at IIT Jammu?
responses: The Jammu lies 302m above the sea level. In Jammu, the climate is warm and temperate. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cwa. Jammu, like the rest of north-western India, features a humid subtropical climate, with summer temperatures reaching 46 °C (115 °F), and temperatures in the winter months occasionally falling below 4 °C (39 °F). June is the hottest month, while January is the coldest month. Please bring a good quality winter jacket/sweater along with gloves and headcap for the winters. You may also bring an umbrella.

patterns: Do Students need to come to the campus for classwork?
responses: Yes, students need to attend the classwork physically.

patterns: Which UG Programs are offered by IIT Jammu for undergraduate students & number of seats in each program?
responses: For the UG programs offered from IIT Jammu & number of seats in each program kindly visit the link https://iitjammu.ac.in/ug-admissions

patterns: How many departments are there in IIT Jammu?
responses:
There are Eleven departments in IIT Jammu.
1. Department of Bio Sciences and Bio Engineering
2. Department of Chemical Engineering
3. Department of Chemistry.
4. Department of Civil Engineering.
5. Department of Computer Science & Engineering.
6. Department of Electrical Engineering.
7. Department of Humanities and Social Sciences
8. Department of Materials Engineering.
9. Department of Mathematics.
10. Department of Mechanical Engineering.
11. Department of Physics.

patterns: What is the UG fee structure at IIT Jammu?
responses: For fee details, visit the link https://iitjammu.ac.in/fee

patterns: Does IIT Jammu provide scholarships/financial assistance to the UG Students?
responses:
The Institute offers the following scholarships to undergraduate students:
- Institute UG Scholarship
- Institute Merit-cum-Means Scholarship
- Institute Free ship Scholarship
- Institute Free Messing Scholarship

Quality for Undergraduates in Engineering, Science and Technology (QUEST) https://iitjammu.ac.in/academic-notifications
Ministry of Tribal Affairs (MoTA) Financial Assistance for ST students https://iitjammu.ac.in/academic-notifications
Students are encouraged to apply on the National Scholarship Portal (NSP) created by the Government (GoI) of India for students across the country. For detailed information please visit https://scholarships.gov.in/

patterns: What are the documents that are required to be submitted for Registration?
responses:
List of documents to be submitted by new UG students at the time of the physical reporting & Registration at IIT Jammu:
1. 2 copies of latest passport size photograph
2. Receipt of the payment made to JoSAA at the time of seat acceptance
3. Receipt of online payment of balance fees. For online payment, in place of Entry Number, please write your StudentID
4. Receipt of the online payment of mess charges. For online payment, in place of Entry Number, please write your StudentID
5. Self-attested copy of Aadhar (student)
6. Seat allotment letter (note down JEE-Adv Roll Number and JEE-adv rank)
7. The original 12th mark sheet and certificate and one self-attested copy
8. The original 10th mark sheet and certificate and one self-attested copy
9. The original category certificate (for OBC-NCL / SC / ST as applicable) and one self-attested copy.
10. The original PwD certificate and one self-attested copy. Medical examination will be done by institute medical officer
11. The original EWS certificate in JoSAA format (as produced during seat allotment)
12. Print out of online application form.
13. FORM A- Undertakings of awareness of academic rules at IIT Jammu
14. FORM B & C- Family Income Statement
15. Self-Declaration: Affidavit on Rs.10 Non Judicial stamp paper duly attested by Notary.
16. Form D- Undertakings by the Parents and Student (Offline Mode)
17. FORM E - Hostel declaration form

patterns: Do all students need to fill Form B, C and Self Declaration?
responses: If your income category is above 5 lakhs and you are not claiming for any concession/ scholarship from the Institute you need not to fill Form C and Self Declaration. However, Form B is to be filled by students of all income categories.

patterns: What is the procedure for Registration?
responses: The detailed list of documents as mentioned above has to be uploaded during online Registration on E-Gov portal (link will be shared on email) by the students. The same documents will be required to be produced by the students at the time of physical reporting for verification. Failure to produce the genuine documents at the time of physical reporting will lead to cancellation of the candidature.

patterns: What are the instructions for the preparatory students?
responses: Please visit the link https://iitjammu.ac.in/ug-admissions

patterns: What are the efforts made by the Institute towards Student Placements?
responses: The prime role of the Training and Placement office is to bridge the gap between the industry leaders of today and the budding leaders of tomorrow. It will continuously be engaged in inviting companies to our campus and will make a rigorous effort to build a long term relationship with the organization. Kindly visit the link for details https://iitjammu.ac.in/cds

patterns: How is Campus life at IIT Jammu?
responses: IIT Jammu offers plenty of opportunities for the holistic development of Students. Apart from intensive academics with regular classes, assignments and quizzes, students are encouraged to pursue extra-curricular activities of their choice throughout the year. For details, please visit https://iitjammu.ac.in/life@iitjammu

patterns: Do students get hostel accommodation and Mess availability at the time of reporting?
responses:
All PG/UG students at IIT Jammu shall be provided hostel accommodation when they report at the institute.

Student will dine in their allotted mess at the time of reporting and charges will be adjusted against the deposit mess advance.

patterns: What furniture and fixtures are provided in student room?
responses:
Institute shall provide a bed, an almirah, a table, and a chair to each student accommodated in the hostel.

There shall be stalls by vendors to purchase a mattress, bucket, mug, and some essential items. A Tuck shop is located in the campus for daily needs. Students/parents can make their own arrangements as well.

patterns: Can parents stay in hostel?
responses: Accompanying parents are not allowed to stay in the Hostels.

patterns: Can ITR be submitted in place of Income certificate?
responses: No, student needs to upload latest income certificate. ITR shall not be accepted in place of income certificate.

patterns: What is Student Id/Entry Number?
responses: Student Id and Entry number are same and will be available once you login on E-Governance.

patterns: What is the fee refund policy for UG students?
responses: As Institute receives the final list of students from JOSAA, who have secured admission, after the last round of admission, no refund of fee shall be allowed in case of withdrawal and only the security amount will be refunded.
